text:
Fans Can’t Stop Gushing Over Thor & Captain Marvel’s First Meeting In Avengers: Endgame Trailer
Fans Can’t Stop Gushing Over Thor & Captain Marvel’s First Meeting In Avengers: Endgame Trailer
The end is near, Marvel fans. The much-awaited full trailer of Avengers: Endgame was finally released yesterday, and boy, it was more dramatic than anyone would have expected it to be.
via GIPHY
There was a lot that the trailer showed and fans couldn’t stop talking about. Hawkeye’s new haircut has become a topic of discussion already. There were new Avengers white suits. Rocket Raccoon was hanging out with War Machine. And to everyone’s surprise, Captain Marvel finally showed up in the present time.
via GIPHY
Captain Marvel arrives and meets Thor in the Avengers: Endgame trailer. The two beloved characters were meeting for the first time. And now, fans can’t get over Thor’s first impression of Carol Danvers AKA Captain Marvel.
via GIPHY
As the Thunder calls for his axe, the weapon flies past Captain Marvel’s head, but she didn’t even flinch. “I like this one,” he tells Black Widow post that. Thor’s reaction is so endearing, isn’t it? Fans cannot stop gushing. They want more of their two favourite superheroes. Take a look.
via GIPHY
a friendship between captain marvel and thor: the two strongest avengers #AvengersEndgame pic.twitter.com/HocLqvxl6w — a saw cm (@cptainxmarvel) March 14, 2019
Brb writing a screenplay that can only be described as: Fifty Shades of Grey but it’s Thor and Carol Danvers — Carrie Wittmer🐻🍊 (@carriesnotscary) March 14, 2019
Don't Miss 117 SHARES 2.5 K SHARES 1.7 K SHARES
And help I already want a buddy cop movie with Thor and Carol #AvengersEndgame — Preeti Chhibber (@runwithskizzers) March 14, 2019
thor after knowing carol for two seconds pic.twitter.com/pN5FmHSCzZ — 𝐣𝐮𝐥𝐢𝐚𝐧𝐚 𝐬𝐚𝐰 𝐜𝐦 𝐱𝟐 | 𝟏𝟏𝟔 (@valkyriethot) March 14, 2019
Look at Thor being all soft with Carol. I CAN'T WAIT FOR THIS FRIENDSHIP! #AvengersEndgame pic.twitter.com/QjzVTrxc2Y — 𝓪𝓁𝒾𝒶𝓈 (@itsjustanx) March 14, 2019
Thor and Carol after meeting for 5 seconds#AvengersEndgamepic.twitter.com/JCXF3XIHiO — Becky || SAW ︽✵︽ (@xBreeTanner) March 14, 2019
Thor making new friends is what I live for pic.twitter.com/9Ls8jWbdPM — melek☀️ (@Lokieed) March 14, 2019
thor and carol in endgame when they both figure out they have glowing eyespic.twitter.com/NlU0TZTctA — ale | saw captain marvel x3 (@AVNGRSWINTER) March 11, 2019
THOR AND CAROL DANVERS. U SEE THAT EXCELLENCE #AvengersEndgame pic.twitter.com/PqWQQ66v93 — hannah (@lillseb) March 14, 2019
Carol and Thor on their way to defeat Thanos #AvengersEndgame pic.twitter.com/5AExwDOqwK — Raquel Anchel🔻︽✵︽ (@Ranchel_) March 14, 2019
Thor meeting Carol Danvers for the first time... #AvengersEndgame pic.twitter.com/vUcOZUcUjF — Mark Brockett (@Tuff_Overlord) March 14, 2019
Thanos when he see's Carol and Thor pulling up to his farm pic.twitter.com/4mNz3r9AGt — Peter come's back next month (@MJxbeanie) March 8, 2019
the only person who ever smiled in the two endgame trailers we got was thor. carol literally breathed and he smiled ohmygod her power pic.twitter.com/D1QoxWblAw — 𝐳𝐨𝐞 𝐬𝐚𝐰 𝐜𝐦 𝟐𝐱 (@neIliescrain) March 14, 2019
carol: not impressed
thor: very impressed pic.twitter.com/AyXrfh1TdN — patricia (@heartfiIiaz) March 14, 2019
thanos when carol and thor show up in front of him pic.twitter.com/SUd9CpLsao — laq saw cm!!! (@spidervesre) March 14, 2019
Thor and Captain Marvel together would be so powerful, don’t you all agree?
